name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a skilled Senior Machine Learning Engineer with 8+ years in software engineering, I bring expertise in **Graph Data Science**, **Graph Neural Networks**, and **Knowledge Graphs**. Proficient in **Python**, I leverage frameworks such as **PyTorch**, **scikit-learn**, and **Pandas** for developing innovative machine learning models such as **Text-to-Query** systems and **Retrieval-Augmented Generation** applications. I have hands-on experience with **Neo4j** and **Neptune**, utilizing **Cypher** for efficient data manipulation and retrieval. My capabilities extend to designing and deploying robust APIs using **FastAPI**, alongside containerization with **Docker** to streamline development processes. With a strong focus on collaborative problem-solving and a customer-centric mindset, I deliver solutions tailored to meet business requirements while aligning with best practices in the industry.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed and implemented scalable **machine learning** solutions leveraging **Python**, **PyTorch**, and **scikit-learn** to optimize **graph data science** applications.
Designed and constructed **knowledge graphs** using **Neo4j** and **Neptune**, enabling advanced retrieval capabilities with **Cypher** and supporting real-time data analysis.
Integrated **graph neural networks** into the **graph experience platform**, achieving a 25% increase in model accuracy through novel **text-to-query models** and **retrieval-augmented generation** techniques.
Created automated querying systems with **Python** and **Pandas**, reducing data retrieval times by 40%, which contributed to enhanced performance across the platform.
Built RESTful APIs using **FastAPI** for seamless integration of machine learning models with existing systems, ensuring high availability and low latency.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to align **machine learning** initiatives with business goals, fostering a **customer-centric mindset** that improved product offerings.
Spearheaded the use of **Docker** containers for deployment of machine learning services, ensuring consistent environments and reducing deployment times by 50%.
Conducted regular performance evaluations of machine learning models, utilizing advanced metrics and enhancing model features with **Pandas** analysis to ensure reliability.
Mentored junior engineers on **machine learning** best practices and development techniques, promoting a culture of continuous learning and **collaboration skills** across the team.
Established a pipeline for integrating large language models into existing applications, streamlining data workflows and improving user interaction by implementing predictive analytics.
Managed data ingestion and processing workflows, ensuring compatibility and compliance with healthcare data standards, and fundamentally enhancing data architecture for graph-based analytics.

• Developed and optimized **Graph Neural Networks** using **Python**, **PyTorch**, and **scikit-learn** to enhance model performance in **Large Language Models** applications.
• Designed and implemented **Knowledge Graphs** with **Neo4j** and **Neptune**, facilitating efficient data retrieval and processing, achieving a **30%** improvement in query response times.
• Leveraged expertise in **Automated querying systems** to streamline interactions with **Graph Data Science** methodologies, resulting in a **25%** reduction in data retrieval times.
• Created and deployed APIs using **FastAPI** to serve machine learning models, ensuring a seamless integration with client applications while providing real-time predictions.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to iteratively refine **Text-to-Query models**, demonstrating strong **collaboration skills** and a **customer-centric mindset**.
• Integrated open-source libraries like **Pandas** for data manipulation and preprocessing, improving dataset handling efficiency by **40%**.
• Deployed containerized applications using **Docker**, enabling consistent environments for development, testing, and production, and reducing deployment times by **50%**.
• Contributed to the development of **Retrieval-Augmented Generation** systems by fine-tuning models and ensuring optimal performance in retrieving relevant data.
• Participated in code reviews and knowledge sharing sessions, enhancing team skills in advanced machine learning techniques and **API development**.
• Implemented testing pipelines for model validation, ensuring reliability and robustness in deployment, leading to a **20%** decrease in post-deployment issues.

Designed and implemented automated querying systems leveraging **Graph Neural Networks** and **Knowledge Graphs** to enhance data retrieval processes and improve data analytics.
Developed machine learning models using **Python** and **PyTorch** for **Graph Data Science** applications, resulting in a **30%** increase in model accuracy for customer behavior predictions.
Utilized **Neo4j** and **Neptune** for graph database management, ensuring optimal performance and scalability, handling more than **1 million** nodes and Edges.
Created and optimized APIs in **FastAPI** for seamless integration of machine learning models and graph databases, improving data accessibility by **25%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to address customer-centric challenges, ensuring that model outputs align with business objectives and user needs.
Implemented **Cypher** queries to manipulate and retrieve data efficiently, reducing query execution time by **40%** and enabling rapid data analysis.
Conducted performance testing of machine learning models and graph databases, ensuring stability and reliability during peak usage times of **up to 1000 concurrent users**.
Developed retrieval-augmented generation strategies, utilizing **Large Language Models** to enhance data interpretation and user query responses.
Automated pipeline deployments using **Docker**, streamlining the integration of machine learning solutions into production environments for consistent delivery.
Managed large datasets with **Pandas** for preprocessing and feature engineering, ensuring that data fed into models is clean and optimized for evaluation.
Collaborated with data scientists and engineers to continually improve performance metrics through iterative model development cycles, achieving significant enhancements in both processing speed and output quality.
Enhanced customer experience by implementing machine learning-driven insights into product recommendations, improving conversion rates by **15%**.

skills:

	PostgreSQL (Fintech), MySQL (Healthcare), MongoDB (Gaming), Redis, Neo4j, Neptune

## **DevOps**
	Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI/CD

## **Other**
	Graph Data Science, Graph Neural Networks, Knowledge Graphs, Cypher, Text-to-Query models, Retrieval-Augmented Generation, Large Language Models, Automated querying systems, Collaboration skills, Customer-centric mindset
